attributes.review: the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. it crashes every 5 seconds and sends me a crazy amount of notifications. I threw my phone across the room bc of how frustrating this app is and now I have to get a new phone. this app said it’s free to download but what about the cost of my phone 😭😭😭
attributes.title: lemme save u some time. DO NOT GET THIS APP.

attributes.review: So I came across this app and figured I would see what they have to say. Upon opening app a flipping fairy started flying around on my phone screen, he was singing” little bunny foo foo if you don’t stop picking up those field mice and bopping on the head.....” over and over. So annoying. Now I live with a fairy. Great. ✊🏼
attributes.title: Trump2020

This app is pornography and should not be on the App Store children could have this app and they will be exposed to something they shouldn’t be if they have it. This app is a disgrace and should be take down IMMEDIATELY!!!
attributes.title: Such a bad app

attributes.review: This app is so bad they almost told me i had to eat my laundry. when i told them it already tasted good they insisted on having a baby. afterwards my mom said that if i didn’t jump off my window she would make me go to wendy’s. she knows how scared i am of them but i mean i guess it comes with the cost of downloading this app. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND VERY BAD APP. FULL OF STINKY LAUNDRY.
attributes.title: SO BADDDD

attributes.review:
As soon as I downloaded this very app my whole family had caught they coronavirus. 😡
Also, I opened the app and the first thing i see is  an overgrown oaf!
Nevermind it’s our president 👁👄👁
I showed my dearest friend this app and she immediately in a matter of seconds went blind.
Not to mention the amount of red white and blue it’s too icky.
My sister had recently called me and said she had gotten an allergic reaction from the content on this app.
I’d like it better if it was a  #settleforbiden app.

0.1/10 very inappropriate and unfit to be seen on the apple store.
attributes.title: NEVER WOULD DOWNLOAD AGAIN 🤢

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get info on the White House and see what was the best and safest way to save Barron Trump but all it gave me was information on this Oompa Loompa looking man 😔. I was honestly scared when I saw this man he will forever haunt my nightmares 👁👄👁. Overall not very impressed would give this zero stars if I could.✨Anyone besides trump 2020✨🥳🤮🧚🏻‍♀️🥰
attributes.title: This app is ✨DISGUSTING✨

attributes.review: It’s a terrible app. I would not suggest anyone downloading it. First it turned my hands small and orange. Second, it downloaded a bunch of bible apps that just crash and take a picture if you try and open them. Third, it called in a tactical drone strike on my location and destroyed my apartment. Then called me the N word.
attributes.title: This App Drone Striked Me

attributes.review: This app has so many glitches and so does trump he wants to do all these bad things and ban tiktok like why would you ban tiktok tiktok is the best better than trump and they might as well delet this app if they was to delete the best app in the App Store tiktok so trump go get a life and don’t delete tiktok or I will delet this app myself🤡🤬😡💩👺
attributes.title: Terrible app and terrible president

attributes.review: I got this app to keep up to date about our president but right when I got it stopped working! I was so upset! Then to make matters worse it put a virus on my phone and made my phone stop working!! So not worth it! They need to either fix the problems or delete it!!!!! So unhappy!!!
attributes.title: The worst app ever!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to pay respects to the late president but unfortunately it was a terrible app. Absolutely the worst app i have ever downloaded. It would constantly crash and it bugged out every time i open the app. Very slow. Anyway rest in peace trump you will be missed but not never forgotten🙏🏽
attributes.title: Rest in peace trump🥺
